name: Bryan Website V2
description: This website - written in vite-react and hosted on github. Main purpose is to learn react along with some git and CI/CD pipline.

name: Clean Fridge
description: A fridge management web application. Share the information with others and manage the fridge together.

name: Horror Maze Generator
description: A 3D maze built with custom collider. Along with custom diffuse-lighting on the controlling character.

name: Easy68k Disassmbler
description: A disassembler writing in assembly and ran in EASY68k (Simulator for Motorola MC68000). Capable 10+ instructions to human-readable format.

name: Spring Theory
description: A simple 2D platformer game made with Unity. The player's goal is to climb to the top without losing all HP.
